alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 5:21PM EDT until July 21 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern DeKalb County in north central Georgia... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Decatur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Decatur, Clarkston, Avondale Estates, Lithonia, Pine Lake, Belvedere Park, North Decatur, Candler-Mcafee, Druid Hills, North Druid Hills, Belmont, Redan, Scottdale, Kirkwood, Panthersville, East Lake, Gresham Park and Snapfinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
